metadata.title: CVE-2020-22402 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SOGo Web Mail before 4.3.1allows attackers to obtain user sensitive information when a user reads anemail containing malicious code.

criterions.comment: sogo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
